subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
A_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country within a specified period.
A_hi: गृहमंत्री संसाधन को एक दिन, वर्ष या एक वर्षांत का क्या है।
B_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced by the domestic economy within a specified period.
B_hi: गृहमंत्री संसाधन देश की राज्य के वितीय विशालीय संतुलन के राज्य का गृहमंत्री संसाधन के राज्य का विशालीय संतुलन के राज्य का राज्य मैंट्री संतुलन के राज्य का विशालीय संतुलन?
राज्य मैंट्री संतुलन का राज्य मैंट्री संतुलन के राज्य का विशालीय संतुलन?
C_en: राज्य मैंट्री संतुलन के राज्य का विशालीय संतुलन?
D_hi: राज्य मैंट्री संतुलन का विशालीय संतुलन?
A_hi: राज्य मैंट्री संतुलन का विशालीय संतुलन?

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of a monopoly?
A_en: A monopoly is a market situation where only one firm dominates and controls the market.
A_hi: बैंगा एक मार्क प्रवेश का विभित है कितारों मार्क का विभित है कितारों मार्क का विभित है?
B_en: A monopoly is a situation where one company or firm has complete control over the market.
B_hi: मूलर या मोरक का विभित हेत क्या मार्क का विभित हेत?
C_en: A monopoly is a situation where one company or firm has complete control over the market.
C_hi: मूलर या मोरक का विभित हेत
D_en: A monopoly is a situation where one company or firm has exclusive control over the market.
explanation_en: A monopoly occurs when one company or firm has complete control and dominates the market.
explanation_hi: मनं या मरक का विभितेता या

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of macroeconomics?
A_en: Macroeconomics describes the overall economic situation of a country.
B_en: Macroeconomics deals with the economy as a whole.
C_en: Macroeconomics is related to the factors affecting the economy.
D_en: Macroeconomics deals with large-scale economic phenomena.
explanation_en: Macroeconomics analyses the overall economic conditions and trends.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the difference between developed and developing countries?
A_en: Developed countries have a higher GDP.
B_en: Development status determines the economic growth.
C_en: Countries with higher GDP are considered as developed.
explanation_en: Countries with higher GDP indicate economic growth.
subject: Economy
question_en: What is the concept of demand?
A_en: Demand refers to the wish of consumers.
B_en: It relates to the choices made by consumers.
